content.text: We are looking for a Business Intelligence (BI) Developer to create...

newsletter.description:
We are looking for a Business Intelligence (BI) Developer to create & optimize BI and analytics solutions that turn Compliance data into knowledge. In this role, you should have a background in data and business analysis. You should be analytical and a good communicator. If you also have business acumen and problem-solving aptitude, we’d like to have you on board. Ultimately, you will enhance our Compliance business intelligence system to help us make better decisions.

Responsibilities:

  • Designing, developing, and maintaining business intelligence solutions (mostly in Microsoft Power BI)

  • Setting up & improving our DevOps environment

  • Creation of comprehensive & optimizing of existing data models

  • Presenting information through reports and visualization

  • Knowledge transfer to our Junior Developers

  • Translate business needs to technical specifications

  • Design, build and deploy BI solutions (e.g. reporting tools)

  • Design, implement and document data architecture and data modeling solutions, which include the use of relational, dimensional, and NoSQL databases

  • Maintain and support data analytics platforms

  • Create tools to store data (e.g. OLAP cubes)

  • Develop unit testing and troubleshooting process

  • Evaluate and improve existing BI systems

  • Optimize database queries

  • Create visualizations and reports for requested projects

  • Develop and update technical documentation

Requirements:

  • Senior experience as a BI Developer or Data Scientist

  • Hands-on relational, dimensional, and/or analytic experience (using RDBMS, dimensional, NoSQL data platform technologies, and ETL and data ingestion protocols)

  • Experience in the banking industry is preferred (esp. Banking Compliance)

  • Familiarity with BI technologies (foremost Microsoft Power BI, but also AWS QuickSight, Qlik Sense)

  • Knowledge of SQL queries, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), and SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)

  • Knowledge in streaming technologies is a plus (real-time data sourcing, eg: Apache Kafka, -Pulsar,..)

  • Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude
